    • Method Detail

      • userNameExists

        public int userNameExists(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String username)
        This method queries the database to determine of the email or username of a new user already exists.
        Parameters:
        email - - The email field of the new user
        username - - The username field of the new user
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if email already exists, 2 if username already exists, and 0 if it is safe to add.
